title: Jauna gaita typeface
content:
Does anyone know whether this font is available digitally? It’s an old one, and I am in love. From my quick research, it might be called Vette Annonc (1950s?). Or, does someone know of a typeface with similar character?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091213032233im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/JG31_vaaks_liels_4579.JPG)
author: anthea

comments.content: A wide and bold version of [Clarendon](http://web.archive.org/web/20091213032233/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/clarendon/urw-clarendon-t-extra-bold-extra-wide/) will get you somewhat close.
Thanks, Eliason. I also just found “Volta” by Bauer Types - the bold. Any others?
